channel.title: Hacking on Codewrecks
channel.description: Recent content in Hacking on Codewrecks

item.title: Vulnhub Tr0ll3 walktrough
item.description: I’ve some time to spend to have fun trying to hack the third machine of Tr0ll series, this time when I issue an nmap I’m disappointed, because I have only ssh port opened. After some tentative with hydra and some set of passwords I felt really stupid, because the instruction on machine told exactly to start:here, so the user is start and the password is here. (next time better reading instructions)
